paper_abstract: In a recent paper Zhang et al. (2015) [2], a new Lyapunov-Krasovskii functional containing the fuzzy line-integral Lyapunov function (LILF) has been introduced to deal with the problem of the stability analysis and stabilization for Takagi-Sugeno (T-S) fuzzy systems with time delay. And less conservative stability and stabilization conditions are achieved. However, the special structural information about the line-integral Lyapunov matrices is overlooked in [2], which is harmful to the validity of the main results. (C) 2015 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A note on "New stability and stabilization conditions for T-S fuzzy systems with time delay" [Fuzzy Sets Syst. 263 (2015) 82-91]
